Operation 'addDeed' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary 'Deed' is too vague and not action-oriented. Description has clarity issues with typo ('reponse'), lacks explicit mention of the request schema (Deed_Application), and doesn't clearly state the 201 response behavior or side effects (deed persistence). Improved version specifies the action (creates), input schema, compliance requirement, response status, and persistence side effect for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
The post Deed endpoint creates a new deed based on the JSON provided.
 The reponse will return a URL that can retrieve the created deed. 
 > REQUIRED: Land Registry system requests Conveyancer to confirm that the Borrowers identity has been established in accordance with Section 111 of the Network Access Agreement.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new deed application in the Land Registry system based on the provided Deed_Application JSON. The operation requires confirmation that Borrower identity has been established in accordance with Section 111 of the Network Access Agreement. Returns a 201 status with a URL reference to retrieve the created deed. The deed is persisted in the system and can be subsequently retrieved using the returned deed reference.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Deed' is too vague and not action-oriented. Description has clarity issues with typo ('reponse'), lacks explicit mention of the request schema (Deed_Application), and doesn't clearly state the 201 response behavior or side effects (deed persistence). Improved version specifies the action (creates), input schema, compliance requirement, response status, and persistence side effect for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/deed/{deed_reference}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Original summary 'Deed' is too generic and not action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the required deed_reference parameter and its format/source. Improved version specifies the action (retrieves), clarifies the path parameter requirement, explicitly states the 200 response, and provides context about parameter validity for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description:
The Deed endpoint returns details of a specific deed based on the unique deed reference.
The response includes the Title Number, Property information, Borrower(s) information and deed information.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves complete details of a specific deed from the Land Registry system using the unique deed_reference path parameter. Returns a 200 response containing the deed's Title Number, Property information, Borrower(s) information, and operative deed details. The deed_reference must be a valid reference previously returned from a deed creation operation.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Deed' is too generic and not action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the required deed_reference parameter and its format/source. Improved version specifies the action (retrieves), clarifies the path parameter requirement, explicitly states the 200 response, and provides context about parameter validity for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.
